title: 06/17/21 DPS Hour 2 Frank Isola
itunes:title: 06/17/21 DPS Hour 2 Frank Isola
description:
Frank Isola tells Dan that the Sixers will be kicking themselves after losing a big lead and losing at home to the Hawks. Frank says that the Jazz have to be disappointed as well after losing to the Clippers without Kawhi Leonard playing.
